name: birthday.io
description: Send birthday videos to your friends and enemies!

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run jscoverage && npm run mocha
scripts.debug: npm run jshint && NODE_ENV=development npm run mocha
scripts.cov-html: npm run jshint && npm run jscoverage && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test -R cov-html > coverage.html

author: Diana Thayer <garbados@gmail.com>
